title: The giant chainmail box that stops a house dissolving
description:
The Hill House, in Helensburgh, Scotland was decades ahead of its time... but that means it's also experimental. And damp. ■ More about the Hill House and how to visit: https://www.nts.org.uk/visit/places/the-hill-house

Edited by Michelle Martin: https://twitter.com/mrsmmartin
Camera by Ben Fitzhugh
